reviewTitle: Started stuttering after a few months of use
reviewDescription: It's very nice, and very liberating to play this way, but it's starting to stutter in most games, and it wasn't when I got it, but no damage has come to it

reviewTitle: Great options from excitement to relaxation.
reviewDescription: We are in our 50s and the options are incredible from exciting games to get adrenaline pumping to relaxing golf or yoga. Can be a little tricky at first to figure out the ins and outs of the games and linking up with friends online but once you get through the technical things it’s endless fun even for us older people. This isn’t just for kids. I would’ve given it 5 stars if it wasn’t for the learning curve.

Received it in March-14 ,Used it about only a week. Suddenly got what I understand is a known ocolus issue. "Black screen of death" tried to clean lenses and sensors,boot the device and factory reset. Nothing helped. So I did contact ocolus for support but after some details exchange they told Me my country is not supported. Already spent 100$ on games & apps which now I can't enjoy.. I'll return this and don't think of replacement as I don't want a poor realbility product with no real support from the manufacturer. Hopefully my device will not be sold as "refurbished" again...
We received this for our granddaughter's birthday.  It was "connected to another account" therefore we couldn't set it up.  We are sending this one back and re-ordering another one

So I got my quest delivered on time by Amazon. When using it I discovered it was slightly blurry on the right side. Upon closer inspection I saw there is a scratch on the INSIDE of the lens. It is directly in the field of vision and makes the experience useless. Soooo disappointed

The quest worked for five minutes before blacking out, the system ram fine but I couldn’t see anything! Then there were a bunch of strange error lights. It was terrible and I’m very disappointed. I hoped to join my family with meta as we have many other systems and I took a chance on Amazon. Never again

reviewTitle: product was defective. I will never buy a refurbished product again.
reviewDescription: I purchased this item as a refurbished product. I thought I was receiving an item that worked. I was wrong. I ended up contacting Meta Quest customer service and they explained that this produced was purchased at best buy, returned to Amazon, and product was defective. I will never buy a refurbished product again.

reviewTitle: Too many kinks, should have waited a year to release it
reviewDescription: Considering that as of the time of this writing Meta still hasn't fixed the pairing issue,  I find it incredibly embarrassing for them.  Without the ability to pair the device is little more than a sci-fi mask to a Halloween costume.  Went online to live chat technical support and was basically told, yes we're aware of the problems with pairing,, our engineers are working on it,. Good Day.

Sent product back. It did not work at all, and smelled like cigarette smoke. If I could give zero stars I would. It was a let down for my son who just turned 12 years old, and was so excited to play on it after waiting so long for us to be able to purchase one. I hope they give us our money back!

This garbage doesn’t work. Purchased for my son’s birthday. I have been troubleshooting, installing, re-installing, downloading this device for HOURS NOW and nothing works. It pairs on my Bluetooth and says that it is connected but the app just says “pairing” and nothing else. I’m so disappointed for my son. Definitely returning this trash device

reviewTitle: Buyer beware don’t buy refurbished buy new
reviewDescription: This unit wouldn’t load up after turning on. Tech support is useless on this product. Both the manufacturer and Amazon couldn’t resolve the issue. After doing research I found this is a very common issue with refurbished units not working due to software updates needed. It’s impossible to update this unit. Asked for a refund and that process is just as bad, still waiting!  BUY NEW! Fix this Amazon!

First of all this item was suppose to be 90% charged.  But it was 90% dead.  Second the headset was locked.  We tried everything to get it to work.  We even reached out for help through the oculus company and different things to do to get it to work on line but I thing worked.  So we are sending it back for a refund.  Thank you anyway.  Brenda

reviewTitle: different app store than oculus rift, and oculus link is hot garbage
reviewDescription: constant battle trying to get oculus link to work.  a typical play session usually involves taking off your headset 2+ times to get link to work.  They've been working on this stuff for years now and they still dont have the 'simplicity' thing downDont buy this if you're expecting to have your oculus rift (PCVR) games work natively on quest 2The UI is nice looking but day 1 of me purchasing this was just getting notified when users who werent on my friends list joined their home (like - why would I need to know that?)
It was good for a while but the right controller broke and the warranty ran out before I even got it

reviewTitle: So much blur it hurt my eyes :(
reviewDescription: I don't know if I got a defective item or not. But I tried everything to get this thing to work and be viewable. I had to be centered directly at something in order to see it clear. Moving 1/4 of an inch and then it was blur and all outside of the little tiny centered section that was clear was all blur. I really wanted to make it work. Downloaded a few programs but couldn't get them to work with the headset then finally gave up :((

reviewTitle: Did not download correctly. Right controller just spins😳
reviewDescription: Did not work properly. The screen kept going down on the picture over and over

Wouldn’t connect to the controllers or my phone, said it needed an update but I wasn’t able to get past the controller screen oculus support told me to factory reset the device to force an update but that didn’t work now they’re saying a lot of people are complaining about this and that they’ll let me know when it’s fixed. Until I’m able to use this product review will stay 2 stars

reviewTitle: AirLink seldom ever works. Getting games on Steam to play is a nightmare.
reviewDescription: It's a step in the right direction, but these headsets definitely still need like 5 more years time for them to work out communicating over Wi-Fi and with PC/AirLink.400$ for this headset, and it won't even connect to my PC half the time. And when it does, the virtual space is all messed up and playing games is impossible.

After about 30 mins it becomes unbearably hot and not to mention the motion sickness, I’ve returned the product but Amazon keeps giving me the run around and not refunding the money, super bummed out by this experience.

reviewTitle: Out of box was fine but didn’t work through link
reviewDescription: Out of the box was fine and for about the first 10 minutes through link it was fine, then it started freezing constantly and it was unplayable. I tried for a week to fix it but nothing worked, even tips from the official website. Do not buy this even though it’s on sale, you’ll end up having to send it back anyway. Just get the extra $50 and buy it off of the official site.
Its a fun lil head set but the battery im lucky lasts a hour before its dead.
Everything was amazing until the vr died and there was no charger found in the box!

It's like having an odd kid room in your own home. If you don't like to work out, this thing will make you work out and have fun at the same time. Playing miniature golf, real golf bowling darts. And many more games. Or do you like shooting games this is the system for you. Boxing more. It is fun to play boxing games. The games are too expensive. And there's a lot of free stuff on there too. Just remember I have plenty of  Make sure you follow the directions on how to take care of it. Remember you're dropping four or 500 bucks on this thing. Seems like a lot but it pays itself off after the usage. Make sure to watch YouTube videos on what games that play that you seem interested in.
Works great brand new in box never opened easy to set up and use

My nine year old twins each got one. They enjoy playing with their friends. Very heavy on the forehead. Makes me dizzy to use, so I couldn't help them get it set up, but they managed to do it on their own.

This Meta Quest 2 - Advanced All-In-One Virtual Reality Headset. I was initially skeptical since it is Refurbished, plus it's made by Facebook.  However, it has exceeded my expectations. I bought it for my son, and it works well.  It was very easy to set up and the battery life is very good for a Refurbished item. Very happy with it.

No tethered cable, no head tracking drift, no camera losing your position, better controllers (I have yet to replace their batteries in the months I've owned them).  Fewer games bother to use advanced textures making most games appear like the best the PS2 had to offer, but that doesn't take away from the immersion.  I play two rounds of Walkabout Mini golf almost daily and head to Pistol Whip or Ragnarok to break a sweat.  Many games have demos or trials and most go on sale eventually. A recent update has made everything feel more responsive. I lack a FB account and easily steer clear of any chat room or social apps.
My 15 year old loves it!! The whole family loves it! It’s too cool!!
One of my favorite electronic items I have bought in a long time. Great for a workout without much effort and lots of fun.
It does more than you know. I don't know what I'd do without it
We loved this product, it is excellent
I got this product for my grandson for Christmas, he absolutely LOVES IT. Even I tried it out and what was amazing. I would recommend this product as a good buy for the family.
